name: eqeqan2d
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0
body: |- wi(wa(wceq(c0, c1), w0), wb(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c3)))

stmt.origin: sylan2(wceq(c0, c1), w0, wb(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c3)), wceq(c2, c3))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wceq(c0, c1), w0), wb(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c3)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c2, c3))
-| wi(wa(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3)), wb(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c3)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wceq(c0, c1), w0), wb(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c3)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c2, c3))
-| wi(wa(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3)), wb(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c3)))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3)), wb(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c3)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wceq(c0, c1), w0), wb(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c3)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c2, c3))

comment: Implication of introducing a new equality. (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 17-Apr-2019.)
